mapper.sql: id, code, delivery_order_id, weight, vegetable_category_id, category_name, vehicle_plate_number, production_location, check_time, qrcode_url, status, qualified, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into quality_sheet (code, delivery_order_id, weight, vegetable_category_id, category_name, vehicle_plate_number, production_location, check_time, qrcode_url, status, qualified, remark, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete ) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{vegetableCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehiclePlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} )

mapper.update:
update quality_sheet
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_order_id = #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL},
vegetable_category_id = #{vegetableCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicle_plate_number = #{vehiclePlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
production_location = #{productionLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualified = #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update quality_sheet set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_order_id = #{deliveryOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=REAL}, vegetable_category_id = #{vegetableCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_plate_number = #{vehiclePlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, production_location = #{productionLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualified = #{qualified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.code as code, a.delivery_order_id as delivery_order_id , a.weight as weight, a.vegetable_category_id as vegetable_category_id, a.category_name as category_name, a.vehicle_plate_number as vehicle_plate_number, a.production_location as production_location, a.check_time as check_time , a.qrcode_url as qrcode_url, a.status as status, a.qualified as qualified, a.remark as remark , case when a.gmt_modified!="" or a.gmt_modified!=null then a.gmt_modified else a.gmt_create end as gmt_create, a.gmt_modified as gmt_modified , a.is_delete as is_delete
mapper.select:
select
from delivery_order b,quality_sheet a where b.id =a.delivery_order_id and( b.receiver_online_user_id=#{useId} or b.driver_online_user_id=#{useId} or b.creator_id=#{useId}) and a.is_delete=0
and( a.category_name like concat("%",#{searchName},"%") or b.order_no like concat("%",#{searchName},"%") )
order by gmt_create desc

select
from quality_sheet a where a.user_id=#{useId}
and( a.category_name like concat("%",#{searchName},"%") or a.code like concat("%",#{searchName},"%") )
and a.is_delete=0
mapper.update: update quality_sheet set is_delete =1 where id=#{qualitySheetId} and user_id!=null
